item.title: My First AI - A Rock, Paper, Scissors Bot
item.description: Summary: Command line AI that uses your play history to predict your next move in a game of Rock, Paper, Scissors. Built in Java. Uses Bayesian statistics. Why Did I Build This? This project was built to showcase an AI technique that I learned from my AI course at the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. How Did I Build This? This project is built in Java and uses simple Bayesian statistics to predict the player’s next move by calculating the probability the player’s next move based on all previous moves and based on his/her previous K moves.
